title: [Large-Scale] Project Leadership Development Course Through e-Learning Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in digital device usage and team project experience
context.additional_context: An intensive short-term course for corporate managers/leaders to execute social problem-solving projects in a gamified environment.

learning_goals: Learners can design at least three team motivation strategies when establishing project plans using gamification elements.
Learners can manage team project progress at over 90% using leaderboards, badges, and quest systems on e-learning platforms.
Learners can achieve over 80% participation in peer evaluations by applying gamification feedback mechanisms.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
